name: misc-utils-of-mine-node
description: Miscellaneous utilities for JavaScript/TypeScript that I often use

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy
scripts.copy: rm -rf dist/spec/support && mkdir -p dist/spec/support && cp -r spec/support/jasmine-js-debug.json dist/spec/support/jasmine.json
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test-js && npm run test
